name: Witness
desc: While in Dark Sight, dead Hunters & Monsters are visible & health restoration is marginally increases when close. Also highlighted in Beetle view.

name: Berserker
desc: All melee attacks do double damage.

name: Peacekeeper
desc: Dead teammates can be revived at the cost of burning some of your Health Chunks. Looting a dead Hunter will restore one Health Chunk.

name: Signee
desc: Boost Event Points by 10%. Please Note: If you have a Hunter with this traits after the end of the event, the trait will be removed and the Upgrade Points will e refunded.
